Text.Text_Ko: 후, 이번 임무는 특히 힘든 일이었어...
Text.Text_En: Phew, this mission was especially tough...

Item.Text_En: Shall we continue from where we left off?

Text.Text_En: Hmm, right. Your secret, huh...
(At that moment, Dr. K's smartphone rings.)
(Dr. K looks at the smartphone and his expression changes.)

Text.Text_Ko: 잠깐만 기다려 봐. 일이 생긴 것 같네.
Text.Text_En: Wait a moment. Something seems to have come up.

Text.Text_Ko: (박사 K가 자리를 떠나자, 당신에게 익숙한 목소리가 들려온다. 제로스다.)
Text.Text_En: (As Dr. K leaves, a familiar voice reaches you. It’s Xeros.)
Phew, I finally shook him off.

Text.Text_Ko: 내가 한바탕 일을 벌여뒀으니, 수습하려면 시간이 꽤 걸릴 거야.
Text.Text_En: I’ve caused a bit of a mess, so it’ll take some time to clean up.
Now, let’s talk again...

Text.Text_Ko: (그 때, 갑자기 나타난 박사 K가 당신의 손목을 잡는다.)
Text.Text_En: (At that moment, Dr. K suddenly appears and grabs your wrist.)
...Who are you in contact with?

Item.Text_En: I don’t know what you’re talking about.

Text.Text_Ko: 발뺌해도 소용없어. 외부에서 너와 교신 중인 신호가 감지됐어.
Text.Text_En: It’s no use trying to deny it. A signal detecting communication with you from the outside was picked up.

Text.Text_Ko: 저번에는 잘못 감지된 줄 알았는데... 설마 이렇게 될 줄이야.
Text.Text_En: I thought it was a false detection last time... I never expected it to come to this.

Text.Text_Ko: ...그 자가 무슨 말을 했든, 듣지 마. 제발.
Text.Text_En: ...Whatever that person said, don’t listen to them. Please.

Text.Text_Ko: 속지 마! 녀석은 너를 이용할 생각일 뿐이야!
Text.Text_En: Don’t be fooled! He’s just trying to use you!

Text.Text_Ko: (중요한 결정을 내려야 할 순간인 것 같다...)
Text.Text_En: (It seems like it’s time for an important decision...)

Text.Text_Ko: 그래, 둘이서 잘 해보라고. ...잘해볼 수 있다면 말이지.
Text.Text_En: Yeah, try to do your best together... if you can.
(The communication with Xeros is cut off.)
...I never thought you'd be on my side.
...Thank you.

Text.Text_Ko: (그 순간, 연구소 전체에 경고 알림이 시끄럽게 울려 퍼지기 시작한다. 붉은 불빛이 깜빡이며 위급 상황임을 알린다.)
Text.Text_En: (At that moment, the entire lab begins blaring with warning alarms. Red lights flash, signaling an emergency.)
Damn, did they break through already...

Text.Text_Ko: 아, 이럴 때가 아니지. 빨리 날 따라와.
Text.Text_En: Ah, this is not the time. Follow me quickly.

Text.Text_Ko: (박사 K는 당신의 손목을 붙잡고 급히 달리기 시작한다. 복도를 달리는 동안, 그녀는 숨을 고르며 중대한 사실을 털어놓는다.)
Text.Text_En: (Dr. K grabs your wrist and starts running hurriedly. As you both run through the corridor, she takes a breath and confesses something crucial.)
Alright... I’ll be honest with you.
The whole thing about you being a secret hero is a lie.

Text.Text_Ko: 널 이용하려면 그렇게 속이는 쪽이 편했거든.
Text.Text_En: It was easier to deceive you like that if I wanted to use you.

Item.Text_En: Yeah, that’s what he said too.

Item.Text_Ko: 어... 너를 선택한 게 벌써부터 후회되기 시작하는 걸...
Item.Text_En: Er... I’m starting to regret choosing you already...

Text.Text_En: I feel ashamed to face you.
But I’ve changed my mind.
If it’s you...

Text.Text_Ko: (그 순간, 근처 연구소 문이 굉음과 함께 날아가고, 기괴하게 생긴 괴물이 나타난다. 괴물은 가죽 같은 날개를 펼치며 포효한다.)
Text.Text_En: (At that moment, a loud crash echoes as the door bursts open, and a grotesque monster appears. It unfurls leathery wings and roars.)
Ugh... Even these monsters have gotten in here!

Text.Text_Ko: 나중에 다 설명할게. 지금은... 지금은 이 녀석들을 막아야 해!
Text.Text_En: I’ll explain everything later. Right now... we need to stop these things!
Yeah, that’s what you should do!
Ha, damn...
As expected, you guys $!#!%@...

Text.Text_Ko: (박사 K는 당신의 손을 뿌리치고 뒷걸음질치더니, 황급히 도망친다.)
Text.Text_En: (Dr. K pulls her hand away from yours, steps back, and hastily runs away.)

Text.Text_Ko: 자, 저 녀석은 신경쓰지 말고 나가보자고... 응?
Text.Text_En: Forget about her, let’s get out of here... huh?
(A loud noise is heard from afar.)

Text.Text_Ko: (당신이 소리가 들려온 곳으로 가보자, 연구소 밖으로 나가는 출구가 막혀있다.)
Text.Text_En: (As you head towards the sound, you find that the exit from the lab is blocked.)
Seriously, this is getting annoying...
Let’s try to find a way out of here for now.

Text.Text_Ko: 원래는 쉽게 나갈 방법이 있었긴 한데...
Text.Text_En: There was originally an easy way out, but...
That person responded faster than expected.

Text.Text_Ko: 이곳을 잘 조사해보자고. 분명 빈틈이 있을 거야.
Text.Text_En: Let’s investigate this place carefully. There should be a gap somewhere.
